plugins.name: done

plugins.name: pr
plugins.description: Create a Pull Request for the current issue branch

plugins.name: ship
plugins.description: Publish a plan as a GitHub Issue and create a branch to start implementation

plugins.name: work

plugins.description: Manage and publish draft blog posts

plugins.name: worktree
plugins.description: Set up git worktrees with SQLite database snapshots for parallel development
